```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

## Column
------------------------------

### Dataset de Iris

```{r}
knitr::kable(iris)
```


## Column
---------------

### Boxplot Species contra Sepal Width

```{r}
iris %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Species, y=Sepal.Width,fill=Species))+
  geom_boxplot()
  
```


### row2

```{r}
iris %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Sepal.Width, y=..density.., fill=Species))+
  geom_histogram()+
  geom_density()+
  facet_wrap(.~Species)
```
